  1. from django.db import models
  2. from django.utils.translation import ugettext_lazy as _
  3. from cms.models import CMSPlugin, Page
  5. class Link(CMSPlugin):
  6. """
  7. A link to an other page or to an external website
  8. """
  10. name = models.CharField(_("name"), max_length=256)
  11. url = models.URLField(_("link"), verify_exists=False, blank=True, null=True)
  12. page_link = models.ForeignKey(Page, verbose_name=_("page"), blank=True, null=True, help_text=_("A link to a page has priority over a text link."))
  13. mailto = models.EmailField(_("mailto"), blank=True, null=True, help_text=_("An email adress has priority over a text link."))
  14. target = models.CharField(_("target"), blank=True, max_length=100, choices=((
  15. ("", _("same window")),
  16. ("_blank", _("new window")),
  17. ("_parent", _("parent window")),
  18. ("_top", _("topmost frame")),
  19. )))
  21. def __unicode__(self):
  22. return self.name
  24. search_fields = ('name',)
